title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Officially Reveals Nickelodeon Collaboration - Nintendo Life
summary: Sega confirms the inclusion of SpongeBob SquarePants and other Nickelodeon characters in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds following earlier character leaks.
timeline: 2025-06-01: Character leaks hint at Nickelodeon collaboration.
why_matters: This collaboration expands the Sonic Racing universe and attracts fans of both franchises, enhancing the game's appeal and market reach.
